description:
Shooting and Sharing with Vine introduces you to the tools and features of the Vine video application. You'll be comfortable and confident in creating and sharing your videos with your friends in no time!

While Vine is user-friendly and simple to operate many of the more creative and useful functions are somewhat hard to find. These videos explore those finer points and also assist you with the basic functions, such as sharing to Facebook and Twitter. You'll quickly learn how to use the Vine app to shoot personal videos.

Michael Miller is a best-selling writer of more than 100 non-fiction books and numerous print and online articles. Collectively, his books have sold more than 1 million copies worldwide. He has also produced a number of instructional videos and presentations for Que Publishing, Alpha Books, America Online, MarketingProfs, and other companies.
title: Shooting and Sharing with Vine
